source_vectors.why: Canonical design map and anti-singularity stance that frames lens fusion and decentralization.
constraints: Harmonic lens balances other signals to avoid runaway behavior.

source_vectors.why: Baseline PhaseCube description detailing influence-only inputs and non-collapse goals.
constraints: Inputs bias probabilities but never overwrite state.

source_vectors.why: System architecture and tunables for PhaseCube, including toroidal lattice and path-B weighting.
constraints: Expose tunables for noise, path-B bias, and damping.

source_vectors.why: Audio bias mapping (freq→depth, pan→x) and overlay cues for transparency.
constraints: Map spectral energy spatially across the grid.

source_vectors.why: Lens-guided tri-grid dialogue blueprint with delay and cross-biasing.
constraints: Support multi-grid interaction without central control.
Allow lens weights to modulate mixing and damping.

source_vectors.why: Memory-biased feedback and plasticity hooks for delayed influence.
constraints: Keep bias reinjection soft and bounded.
Document TODOs for scaling and storage.

source_vectors.why: Dual-grid with delayed bias and damping safeguards plus interpretability expectations.
constraints: Preserve cross-grid dialogue knobs (noise, cross-talk, plasticity).

source_vectors.why: Harmonic stabilizer grid with audio bias and lens mixing guidance.
constraints: Include harmonic damping layer tied to lens signals.
Allow audio-like bias injection with graceful fallback.

summary: Adds a lens-guided tri-grid swarm with decaying spectral bias, harmonic damping, and canvas overlay scoped to DX7F9L2Q1A3B.
